text.en: Are you okay? Are you really okay?

text.ko: 별일 아니었으면 좋겠네. 병원 꼭 가봐요.
text.en: I hope it wasn't anything serious. Please make sure to go to the hospital.
Ma'am, are you by any chance single? If so, would you like to meet my dad?

text.ko: 우리 아빠 한번 만나 보실래요? 진짜 괜찮은 사람이거든요.

text.en: No, I have to go to work.

text.ko: 아, 네. 방해 안 할게요. 근데
text.en: Ah, okay. I won't disturb you. But I'm really grateful, so can we at least exchange numbers?

text.ko: 진짜 감사해서 그러는데 번호 교환만 해요.
text.en: But I'm really grateful, so can we at least exchange numbers?
The house is so nice. You've decorated it beautifully.
Serin, I bought some natural eggs at the farmers' market this morning.

text.ko: 토종 달걀을 사 왔어. 출산한 지 얼마 안 됐잖아.
text.en: You just gave birth recently, so you need to take good care of yourself.

text.ko: 몸조리 잘해야 돼. 엄마가 이거로 맛있는 거 해줄게.
text.en: I'll make something delicious with these for you.

text.ko: 아, 이런 싸구려는 좀 그만 가져오세요. 더럽잖아요.
text.en: Oh, please stop bringing such cheap stuff. It's dirty.
